original_title: Joe Pasquale: Return of the Love Monkey
overview: Joe takes you on a comic journey like no other - he introduces you to his break dancing Nan; he challenges Houdini's reputation with an act of escapology that even David Blaine deemed too stupid, and he takes you on the camping journey of a lifetime! So sit back, take your medication and let yourself go on a journey with Joe! Filmed in front of a live audience at The Cliffs Pavillion in Southend.
title: Joe Pasquale: Return of the Love Monkey
